content: Lifestyle Asked by AnonymousAsked on 18 Aug 2019What should I do when the way we split the bill with my friends bothers me?Hi, I usually dine out with my friends and I felt unfair when they readily offer to pay the bill first and the other would have to "paynow" the person who foot the bill. However, I felt I am at the losing end as the person footing the bill will get to enjoy card benefits ie. reward points while the others simply had to repay based on the actual bill. How do I solve this by not showing my displeasure to my friends?4 answersAnswerBump0

Do you have a card that enjoys similar card benefits? Or you are just jealous that your friends are getting extra benefits from the card at the cost of you guys eating out?If you do, I presumed you are dining out with similar clique, maybe come to an agreement that each time you guys dine out, each person have the chance to pay the bill?
